meta.title: About Us - Clivy
meta.description: Learn about Clivy, the WhatsApp API platform developed by Information Systems students at Telkom University.

hero.title: About Clivy
hero.description: WhatsApp API platform developed by Information Systems students at Telkom University to help businesses communicate with customers.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Clivy is a WhatsApp Business API platform born from a collaborative project of Information Systems students at Telkom University. We understand that effective communication between businesses and customers is the key to success in the digital era.
story.paragraph2: By leveraging modern technologies such as Next.js, TypeScript, and WhatsApp Business API, we present a solution that is not only powerful, but also easy to use. Our platform is designed to help businesses of various scales, from SMEs to enterprises, in managing their WhatsApp communications professionally.
story.paragraph3: This project is a manifestation of our dedication to applying knowledge gained in college into real solutions that benefit the wider community.

items.question: What are your customer service hours?
items.answer: Our WhatsApp support is available Monday to Friday, 9AM-6PM WIB. Email support is available 24/7 with responses within 24 hours. Consultation appointments can be scheduled Monday to Friday, 9AM-5PM WIB.

items.question: How quickly do you respond to support requests?
items.answer: WhatsApp messages are typically answered within 15 minutes during business hours. Email inquiries receive responses within 24 hours. For urgent issues, we recommend using WhatsApp for the fastest response.

items.question: Do you provide technical support after project completion?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive post-launch support including bug fixes, minor updates, and technical assistance. Extended support packages are available for ongoing maintenance and feature enhancements.

items.question: Can I request changes to my ongoing project?
items.answer: Yes, change requests can be accommodated depending on the project phase and scope. Please contact our project management team to discuss modifications, timeline impacts, and any additional costs.

items.question: What information should I include in my support request?
items.answer: Please include your project details, a clear description of the issue, steps to reproduce the problem (if technical), screenshots or error messages, and your contact information for follow-up.

items.question: Do you offer emergency support for critical issues?
items.answer: Yes, we provide emergency support for critical issues that affect business operations. Contact us immediately via WhatsApp for urgent technical problems or system outages.
